1.title: Episode #3.1

episode of.title: Rock of Love with Bret Michaels (TV Series 2007– )

1.plot: Twice unlucky in love, this time Bret Michaels leaves his mansion behind and takes twenty even more beautiful babes on tour with him to find a girlfriend who can handle his life on the road. One girl's shocking behavior at the concert after-party makes the others wonder just what kind of girl Bret is looking for. The answer comes when Bret picks which fifteen girls get to continue on the tour.

2.title: Episode #3.2

episode of.title: Rock of Love with Bret Michaels (TV Series 2007– )

2.plot: Fifteen girls take turns reciting their own wedding vows to Bret.

3.title: Episode #3.3

episode of.title: Rock of Love with Bret Michaels (TV Series 2007– )

3.plot: Bret is looking for a woman with maternal instincts...so he puts his twelve girls in ice skates to see how well they protect "Baby Bret" against the University of Illinois Women's Hockey Team and special guest player, Lacey.

4.title: Episode #3.4

episode of.title: Rock of Love with Bret Michaels (TV Series 2007– )

4.plot: Bret Michaels has a concert tonight. Ten girls compete to see who can clear the band's equipment off the stage the fastest.

5.title: Eight Is Not Enough

episode of.title: Rock of Love with Bret Michaels (TV Series 2007– )

5.plot: The eight remaining girls get a distressing "wake-up call" when Bret brings in three new girls to join the tour because he's not feeling the emotional effort. In fact, one of the girls tells Bret that someone here is actually engaged! Bret has to sort out the truth from the rumors and decide which girl to eliminate from the tour.

6.title: Episode #3.6

episode of.title: Rock of Love with Bret Michaels (TV Series 2007– )

6.plot: It's Pink Bus vs. Blue Bus in the muddiest of Mudbowls yet! Bret flies away with the MVP for an intimate overnight trip. One of our tour girls has trouble dealing with her recently passed father, and Bret deals with some bad news of his own. But the show must go on, and Bret is forced to make another tough decision regarding who stays and who goes.

7.title: Truck Stop Games

episode of.title: Rock of Love with Bret Michaels (TV Series 2007– )

7.plot: Bret holds the first ever Truck Stop Games for the girls. One team resorts to cheating and friction starts increasing. An evening at Bret's concert gets out of hand and Bret has to bend the rules of the game because of it.

8.title: Bikini Day Care

episode of.title: Rock of Love with Bret Michaels (TV Series 2007– )

8.plot: Only 7 remain after Kami's forfeit and Kelsey's premature elimination. The mood rises when Brett announces a bikini competition - but it's not what the girls expect. Unsurprisingly, some of the girls then won't even put an effort into it.

9.title: Exes and Oh's

episode of.title: Rock of Love with Bret Michaels (TV Series 2007– )

9.plot: Any skeletons in the closet(s)? Bret's friends Heather and Ambre act as judges to the 6 accused girls and their exes are the witnesses. Predictably, meltdowns, catfights and unbelievable twists are unavoidable.

10.title: Duet to Me One More Time

episode of.title: Rock of Love with Bret Michaels (TV Series 2007– )

10.plot: Each of the four has to come up with lyrics to Bret's music and to sing them. The winner gets to go on a date in Texas. Tensions start to mount and friendships are put to the test. Bret's attempt at a solution creates more problems.

11.title: Double Dates

episode of.title: Rock of Love with Bret Michaels (TV Series 2007– )

11.plot: In Miami, Brett tries to have a carnival-theme evening with the last three girls, but it doesn't go well. He then has two double date days, leaving a different girl out both times. Then it's time to choose the finalists.

12.title: Episode #3.12

episode of.title: Rock of Love with Bret Michaels (TV Series 2007– )

12.plot: Bret takes the two finalists to the Dominican Republic. Both get one day exclusive time with Bret. One gets to tango, the other to go into the jungle. Then it's time for the final decision.

13.title: Reunion

episode of.title: Rock of Love with Bret Michaels (TV Series 2007– )

13.plot: It's been three months since Bret stood on the beach in Puerto Rico and made a very special girl his Rock of Love. Now she and the rest of the girls have gathered for the hottest reunion ever! Together they'll relieve the alliances, betrayals, and drunken nights that made this season unforgettable and forever added the term "Blondtourage" to Bret's vocabulary! Before it's all over, blows will be traded and one of the girls will make a tearful confession that might change her and Bret's future forever. Don't you dare exit until the bus has come to a complete stop!

1.title: Don't Threaten Me with a Good Time

episode of.title: Rock of Love with Bret Michaels (TV Series 2007– )

1.plot: Bret Michaels, lead singer of the Rock band Poison, welcomes 25 young ladies to his rocker lair in the hopes of finding that one special girl he can call his own.

2.title: Talk Dirty to Me

episode of.title: Rock of Love with Bret Michaels (TV Series 2007– )

2.plot: With 16 girls all fighting for Bret's affection, tensions are running high and alliances are being formed as the ladies try to eliminate each other from the competition for Bret's heart.

3.title: Motocross

episode of.title: Rock of Love with Bret Michaels (TV Series 2007– )

3.plot: Bret loves motorcycles, so he challenges the twelve remaining girls to put the pedal to the metal in a motocross relay race. But first the girls have to learn how to ride and it's not as easy as it looks.

4.title: Riff It Good

episode of.title: Rock of Love with Bret Michaels (TV Series 2007– )

4.plot: Bret wants a woman with a creative side, so he gives the remaining 10 women a music challenge. In teams of 2, the girls write lyrics to one of Bret's tracks then perform their song on stage in front of Bret, Big John and a special guest judge.

5.title: First Annual Bret's Mudbowl

episode of.title: Rock of Love with Bret Michaels (TV Series 2007– )

5.plot: Eight girls remain and Bret wants to see who's willing to get down-n-dirty for him in the First Annual Bret's Mudbowl!

6.title: Tour Bus Challenge

episode of.title: Rock of Love with Bret Michaels (TV Series 2007– )

6.plot: The ladies compete in various challenges all relating to the life of a musician on the road, and the winner gets a solo date with Bret.

7.title: Show Me Your Hits

episode of.title: Rock of Love with Bret Michaels (TV Series 2007– )

7.plot: This week Bret has arranged for his remaining sexy six to shoot an album cover for his latest release. The girls are divided into two teams and compete against each other trying to create an eye popping and sexy layout.

8.title: Superfan Challenge

episode of.title: Rock of Love with Bret Michaels (TV Series 2007– )

8.plot: Bret is down to his fabulous five and he's getting serious about finding the right girl. He calls on three of his super fans to come in and interrogate the ladies.

9.title: Vegas Baby!

episode of.title: Rock of Love with Bret Michaels (TV Series 2007– )

9.plot: It's time to see who can handle Bret's rock star life on the road, so the final four girls hop on the tour bus and head to Vegas where Bret is playing a big show.

10.title: Meet the Parents

episode of.title: Rock of Love with Bret Michaels (TV Series 2007– )

10.plot: Only three girls left in the house and now it's time for their parents to meet Bret.

11.title: Clip Show

episode of.title: Rock of Love with Bret Michaels (TV Series 2007– )

11.plot: Check out the season highlights and TONS of never before seen footage of Bret and his ladies. Find out the real story behind Heather's tattoo, the behind the scenes practical jokes, and much, much more!

12.title: The Rose and the Thorn

episode of.title: Rock of Love with Bret Michaels (TV Series 2007– )

12.plot: Things heat up when Bret tells the final 2 girls to pack their bikinis 'cause they're goin' for an exotic getaway to Cabo San Lucas, Mexico!

13.title: Reunion

episode of.title: Rock of Love with Bret Michaels (TV Series 2007– )

13.plot: See crazy audition tapes of the ladies lining up to win the heart of Poison-rock god Bret Michaels!

1.title: Back to the Rocking Horse

episode of.title: Rock of Love with Bret Michaels (TV Series 2007– )

1.plot: Bret Michaels, lead singer of rock band Poison, is back looking for love, and this time he means it!

2.title: Peep Show

episode of.title: Rock of Love with Bret Michaels (TV Series 2007– )

2.plot: Fifteen girls better watch what they say & especially when they're on a dare.

3.title: Stroller Derby

episode of.title: Rock of Love with Bret Michaels (TV Series 2007– )

3.plot: Bret might be a big time rock star but he's also a big time family man.

4.title: A Ride on the Wild Side

episode of.title: Rock of Love with Bret Michaels (TV Series 2007– )

4.plot: Bret wants a girl with good manual skills so he tests their aptitude with nuts and bolts in a custom motorcycle build off.

5.title: Mud Bowl II

episode of.title: Rock of Love with Bret Michaels (TV Series 2007– )

5.plot: The Â"Divine NineÂ" compete in the second annual Bret Michaels Mud Bowl!

6.title: Once a Cowgirl

episode of.title: Rock of Love with Bret Michaels (TV Series 2007– )

6.plot: For the two women who have yet to win a date with Bret, RodeoÂ's Rocking Rodeo could be their last chance to make a connection.

7.title: Red, White and a Little Blue

episode of.title: Rock of Love with Bret Michaels (TV Series 2007– )

7.plot: The remaining seven girls display their ability to rock an audience as they perform at a USO show for military veterans.

8.title: Video Vixens

episode of.title: Rock of Love with Bret Michaels (TV Series 2007– )

8.plot: With only six girls left in the house, tensions run high as Bret tests the girlsÂ' creativity by making them shoot, direct and edit their own music videos.

9.title: Going to Ex-tremes

episode of.title: Rock of Love with Bret Michaels (TV Series 2007– )

9.plot: Bret shocks the girls by inviting their exes. He takes the guys out on the town to dig up dirt on the girls.

10.title: Bitter Suite

episode of.title: Rock of Love with Bret Michaels (TV Series 2007– )

10.plot: Bret surprises the final four with a trip to Las Vegas.

11.title: Rockin' the 'Rents

episode of.title: Rock of Love with Bret Michaels (TV Series 2007– )

11.plot: Bret wants to know more about the three remaining girls, and what better way to get the 411 than moving their parents into the house

12.title: Bret's Rock of Love

episode of.title: Rock of Love with Bret Michaels (TV Series 2007– )

12.plot: Bret takes his final two girls south of the border to spend some quality, romantic time with each one before making his final choice.

13.title: Reunion

episode of.title: Rock of Love with Bret Michaels (TV Series 2007– )

13.plot: It's reunion time and Bret has gathered all of his ladies for one more night of bawling and brawling. See what the girls are up to now and how the relationship between Bret and Ambre has survived.

imdb.title: Rock of Love with Bret Michaels
plot: Through a series of challenges, women compete for a chance to live with rock star Bret Michaels, who rose to fame in the '80s by fronting the band Poison.::IMDb editor
